A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I created an account and left a review for the first time ever because I feel it's my duty as a lifelong Star Wars fan to do my part and express how horrified\, angry\, and heartbroken I am at what they've done to the franchise.  There have been bad Star Wars films before\, but for the many\, many reasons others have outlined\, the saga going forward is beyond repair.
